inclusion.criterion: complain of localized provoked vulvar pain
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: meet the criteria for the diagnosis of localized provoked vulvodynia
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: have failed or have been unable to tolerate previous attempts at systematic therapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: dermatologic or neurologic condition which is determined by the investigator to be the primary cause of the patient's pain
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to any of the medications or the base itself
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Tramadol (UltramTM, ConZipTM, RybixTM, RysoltTM, Ultram ERTM)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has myasthenia gravis and takes pyridostigmine. She still experiences symptoms that interfere with her job.
